summary: NAR 04/10/2003  IT APPEARS TO THE CONSUMER THAT THERE IS A DESIGN PROBLEM WITH THE  #5 FUEL INJECTOR,  IT ALSO INSIGNIFICANT THAT A FUEL INJECTOR NEEDS TO BE REPLACED EVERY 28,000 MILES. A FUEL INJECTOR IS NOT A MAINTENANCE PROBLEM. PLEASE LOOK INTO WHETHER IT IS A DESIGN FLAW AND IF CHEVROLET WILL CORRECT PROBLEM.   *CB
